item.title: Takin' Me Away From You Train
item.description: Transcribed from episode 22 of Pete Seeger’s Rainbow Quest Len Chandler is a seemingly lost gem from the 60s folk revival. His studio albums are a bit forced and over-produced, though the live recordings he appears on are excellent While this particlar song is more personal and sentimental, he was also very politically conscious. Here’s a verse he added to Which Side Are You On?: Come all you bourgeois black men With all your excess fat A few days in the county jail Will sure get rid of that
